t: What can I do if someone stole my design on Merch by Amazon? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 3): Nothing. From what I heard. You can always report an infringement. If it’s some John Doe who happened to copy your design “just because”… he liked it, and wanted to sell it as well (pixel to pixel, or with small changes), then reporting infringement is useful.
